title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item at first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item cannot be selected on the first try.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.

Observed behavior (OB): No item is selected on the first attempt.
Expected behavior (EB): The item should be selected on the first attempt.
Steps to reproduce (SR): 
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.
3. Note that the item is not selected on the first try.
4. Repeat the selection process a second time, and observe that the item can be selected.
